CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Such improvement of PCE comes from relatively highefficiency photon - to - electron conversion in the broad range of the absorption in the blend film of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| PCBM |

(Note: The abbreviations PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM refer to specific materials, and therefore, they are considered material names.)

| in the blend film |

| relatively high efficiency of photon-to-electron conversion |
| in the broad range of the absorption |
| in the blend film |

| PCBM (material) |

Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Such improvement of PCE comes from relatively highefficiency photon - to - electron conversion in the broad range of the absorption in the blend film of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value               |
|-----------------------------|
| relatively high efficiency   |
| photon - to - electron conversion |
| in the broad range           |
| of the absorption            |
| in the blend film             |
| of PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) and PCBM |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value               |
|-----------------------------|

| in the broad range           |
| of the absorption            |
| in the blend film             |

Explanation: I assumed that "relatively high efficiency" refers to the photon-to-electron conversion efficiency, and "broad range of the absorption" refers to the range of absorption in the blend film. Therefore, I included those as separate entities. The other entities are clearly referring to material properties.
